attributes.action: Abolish the teaching of creationism or intelligent design as scientific fact  in state schools, and state funding of state of faith schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Creationism should not be taught as fact in the modern world; for one thing there are many and diverse creation stories from different cultures (are they not equally valid), but the only ones we hear of provide little by way of testable theory (simply saying something  cannot be explained by other current theories is no argument for invoking an all-purpose intelligent designer).  The state has no business to be sponsoring education IN (not about) specific (and contradictory) faith doctrines.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
